title: Can we get an "And/Or" system for teambuilder?
body:
There are plenty of times I'd take a tank or a support for bottom lane with the marksman, but leaving it as "any" just dumps it full of adcs. I'd love to get a system that lets me select multiple roles that I'd accept to a lane.


A few suggestions gathered from the comments:

Allow the captain to mark multiple roles that would be accepted in a lane
~~Allow the captain to mark multiple roles that would *not* be accepted in  a lane~~ excessive with above
Give solos the ability to queue as a champ w/ multiple lanes or roles selected 
Give solos the ability to queue as a lane w/o selecting champ first



Also, Riot I love team builder! It's one of the better things you've done for the game and I can't tell you enough times how much I appreciate its creation.

replies.body:
Sorry "Tank" Supports, team builder hates you.

Oh, you're a "Support" support? Welcome! 

While we're at it, why don't we add a "Not" filter. Honestly, I don't care if the second person bot lane Identifies as a "Mage", "Tank", "Support", "Fighter", etc, so long as they aren't a "Marksman"
Yeah, right  now the worst thing is captains searching "any role" supports and kicking so many marksmen that they get 1 minute punishment after a kick.

While we're at it, we should be allowed to que up for multiple positions. For example, let's say I really want to play a game as Cho'Gath. He can be played top, mid, jungle, or even support in a pinch. It'd be nice if I could select ALL the positions or roles I'm happy to play, instead of locking myself into one.
But would u like a preferred role in that list?

Or, more broadly, I wish I could just queue up as a "jungler". Does our team look squishy? Okay, I'll go Naut. Is our top/mid/support all AP? Okay, I'll go Nocturne. Is everyone AD? Okay, Fiddles then.
That would be awesome!
I spam Teambuilder all day, lol, and this would be helpful for sure. Especially the Tank/Support bot lane thing. Pls Reto Gems ;-;
It needs to just give you a little check list.
Plz rito

Good idea but I'm just thinking the amount of work it has to be done on coding to actually achieve that, plus redesign the champion select so it will show what roles/lanes will be selecting it just gives me a headache. 

Basically is done the way it is because it was easier that way, I agree with your suggestions and that it will improve the team builder experience but honestly is a pain in the ass to code all those variables and it will require a few weeks of work plus test. 

It will be a nice feature to have if riot decide to spend that kind of time and resources onto it,
I get that it would be some work, but as it is team builder is a bit clunky (particularly with bottom lane) without this kind of functionality.

Twisted Tree line hasn't been ignored it got updated 3 months ago. Dominion, now that's a different story.
